website_summaries.verdict: Coming in a variety of sizes, this cover makes it easy to find something that is close to a perfect fit for your particular grill.
pros: Extra room around the sides of the cover allow plenty of space for the bulk often associated with gas grills
Velcro straps keep the cover secure around the grill during heavy winds
cons: The stitching around the seams can start to come undone after several months of intense use

customer_reviews.title: Price , shipping time and perfect fit for my grill
customer_reviews.text: I got my cover today, it fits perfectly, the material looks strong and water resistant, all around looks a good choice, remember it’s under $20 usd, and to be honest, i don’t know how they do it, my was overnight, shipping along is probably more than $10, I am a happy customer and will recommend to anyone looking for a nice inexpensive grill cover.
customer_reviews.author: DJ KARLOS

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The only time this cover has ever come loose was during a really wild wind storm...and only then because we forgot to velcro one side. It's a bit large for our grill and I wish the cover had the ability to velcro even tighter, but I really can't complain. It's kept our grill clean and dry for almost a year now! Still in great condition, would definitely recommend. Absolutely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AdventureIsOutThere!

customer_reviews.title: gas2coal
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our gas2coal grill. seems nice quality will updated if it ends up not lasting long
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This actually feels pretty high quality. I was impressed. Instead of tying to the grill, it has velcro straps to tighten it a bit. Don't know if that will make it less secure, but seems fine. Fits grill perfectly. Comes in a bag that then has no purpose anymore, heh.
customer_reviews.author: EposVox

customer_reviews.title: CERTAINLY NOT WHAT I EXPECTED !!
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought this was going to be a good value, but waited a while to do the review, glad that I did....I have had for less than a year....which I believe is the manufactured warranty....the color is nearly gone, went from dark black to almost white now, and, starting to show wear, small holes opening up on the corners, not really any stress, the cover simply sets on top of the grill, will see IF I get a response....most likely will take a picture or 2 and forward....still waiting for a response from the seller...was hoping to hear from seller about the fading and tearing on the corners....
customer_reviews.author: rmjessen

customer_reviews.title: Above and Beyond!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the grill cover. I had an issue with the first one that was sent and the company actually reached out to me and sent me a replacement within days. The replacement cover is great. The material is very durable and made well. I can't say enough about this company's customer service and care of their customers. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Org Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill cover with one reservation...
customer_reviews.text: Below is my original comment. I would now like to post an update: Although the cover did not fit my grill, this company immediately responded stating the dimensions of their cover. I confirmed that the cover did not fit. They replied that I could keep the cover and offered a refund. I wish they made a grill cover that would fit my grill as this is exactly the type of company I would like to do business with. Outstanding customer service!! Original comment: Prompt shipping & great price. I own a Weber Genesis E-Series & the cover is too long & gets caught under the wheels when I roll the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Online

customer_reviews.title: Well Made at a Fair Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Well made and a very decent price especially when compared to the higher priced junk covers at the big box stores. But, the true measure will be how it holds up after a full summer of use. I'll post an update in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: G2USNY

customer_reviews.title: This cover has fallen apart in less than one year ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover has fallen apart in less than one year. At the seams is another fabric to cover the seams, it is crumbling and falling apart. 11/7/17 Vendor has contacted me and offering replacement. Pleased to see them reaching out!!! Replacement cover received- truly a pleasure! Thank you for reaching out, truly appreciated!!!! This was fabulous customer service!!!! We have had the cover for over three weeks, it fits better, and looking great. Thank you again for great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but in less than 4 months on a grill outside, the top has faded to a light gray, and the stitching for the side hand holds are deteriorating. I doubt that this cover will survive a full summer. I've also noticed in heavy rain there is some water penetration. If your grill isn't in direct sun, this might be ok, but if you are covering a grill in full sun, look at other options. Follow up note; without asking, the seller MachineG refunded my money for this item. Seems like a good company, I just wish their product was as good as their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: njpsu

customer_reviews.title: Homitt Gas Grill Cover, 58-inch 600D Heavy Duty Waterproof BBQ Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I actually expected that the cover would be a little thicker. It has been very windy in the weeks we have owned this cover and it has held up just fine. My previous covers have been heavier but they had a woven fabric outer layer and the winter weather just kills them. We get about three seasons max. I gave this cover 4 stars until I see what Ohio winter does in terms of durability and color retention.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: It's fading.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Customer service immediately reached out to me and sent a brand new (UV resistance cover) free of charge. Will update (with due time) on how this new cover resists to the sun here in Northern Virginia. Thanks! Purchased this item 8 months ago and it's already fading with the sun in northern Virginia. I can imagine how much quicker this would fade down south. It's still protecting the grill and has no cracks or tears so 4 stars for fading.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: A company that backs up their product
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the first one I ordered which was apparently faulty. It is made with thick strong material but after a year of being out in the Florida elements the black became gray. I made contact with the Hormitt company and they immediately apologized informing me that this was uncommon. They sent me another as a replacement. So far so good. I gave it 5 stars for being a company that stands behind their product and how easily the rectified the situation. I will update this if any issues arise with the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Will Fro

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Provided
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover in the middle of 2018 for my patio where there is direct sunlight and decent wind. As of fall/winter of 2019 the cover had been badly weathered due to the sunlight. The black color has all but faded and there was a tear on the right edge. The cover was strapped down securely every time it was in use. I would not recommend this cover if it's going to be in the sunlight. ----UPDATE---- Customer service contacted me and sent me a newer version cover that was brand new. Updating back to 5 stars as so far it's been great!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great item for price
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for a 64 in charbroil grill. The Velcro straps are much longer than my previous grill cover and provide a much stronger hold than a shorter strap. The handles are nice and allow to shift the grill with the cover on. Only time will tell on the UV protection, which was the primary reason for getting this item when looking for a new cover (replaced an extremely sun bleached cover and torn due to wind storm blowing over the grill). The color hasn't appeared to fade after two weeks but again that is too early to really tell.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: totally disintegrated after one winter outside. got contacted by the manufacturer after leaving negative feedback. they offered a refund or replacement, claiming that they changed the material of the grill cover. I took the replacement and will test it for one year and will report back after that.
customer_reviews.author: C O

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL FAILURE IN 59 DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this cover for 59 days (purchased March 9, 2018) and already: 1) The color is completely faded on the top, with the material becoming more brittle by the day. 2) The piping along the seams is falling apart! See the picture for details... I've contacted Homitt to see how they will honor their 12 month warranty OR their 60-day money back guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: T. Collins Logan

customer_reviews.title: Fades and becomes brittle
customer_reviews.text: Purchase in 2017 for my weber grill. It fit great and I thought it was going to be awesome. After a year the cover was completely useless. It faded in the sun almost immediately. Within a few months it was basically white. By that point it was so brittle any touch caused material to come off it. Eventually it ended up with a tear right in the top that just kept growing. I finally threw it away. I came back to amazon to see reviews on this and what do you know everyone else had the same issue. I would steer clear of this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Fades in 1 year  - Customer service is responsive
customer_reviews.text: ***Update 6/7/2018 - customer service offered to refund or replacement - I selected replacement which was sent and received quickly. Looks same as last cover will take time to see if it fades. Rasing review one star based on customer service Fades in 1 year. Initially great fit, nice fabric. I live in MI and there is almost no sun for 4 months out of the year, can't imagine how fast this would fade in FL. Alos small hole in the top - easily tore
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: In no way UV resistant or waterproof
customer_reviews.text: any claim or review which says this is UV resistant in any way are false. Received Jan 25th...June 11th it is fading white and falling apart. Forget about making it through 1 summer....didn't even make it to summer Before Homitt replies with it's scripted, insincere, PR reply stop...let me preempt. Your 60 day guarantee is useless to me. Your 12 month warrant...ok ship me one automatically every 4 months until you return to your previous vendor for fabric. Or maybe you have not changed vendors for the fabric and they are screwing you.not you screwing us. Obviously with 1000 positive reviews...you once upon a time had a quality product...Thieves.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last 3 Weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover didn't last 3 weeks before the seam split. It is in a semi-protected area so it isn't exposed to high winds or heavy rain. I have had many grill covers over the years and never had one fail in such a short time nor with a seam failure. Poor quality in the manufacturing process. I don't know if it would have held up otherwise but it is being returned. Look elsewhere, the are plenty of other covers out there.
customer_reviews.author: A P.

customer_reviews.title: Good weatherproofing, bad UV protection
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover performed admirably during the winter where it held up against the cold, ice, and snow very well. However, within the first 3 months of sunny season, it promptly faded and weakened the textiles. The durability was not good. The cover tore recently as I was attempting to put it back on in the areas most affected by the sun's UV fading. Slightly disappointed as this cover did not make it through a whole summer. I would recommend purchasing one with better UV protection if your grill sits out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Original Faded really fast.  Will report on replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and large but as far as UV coating goes, don't believe it. This one faded faster than any of the generic ones I had bought at the local hardware store, Would not buy again for because it is not very UV proof. I bought this a while ago. Just now getting around to posting a review. It faded in less than a month. Updating. Homitt contacted me about this review and offered to send a replacement. Customer support is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weber Smokey Mountain 22.5 Cover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Weber Smokey Mountain 22.5 Cover -This cover is thick and weatherproof and seems very sturdy. -I'm not sure what specific grill this is designed for, but I use one for me Weber Smokey Mountain 22.5, and it works like a charm. It has a little room so it is not super snug, but it is tight enough to keep the wind from blow it off. There is a little extra room at the bottom but does a great job of covering the entire smoker -I also use one for my Pit Barrel cooker, and it is quite large for that smoker, but still does the job
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cost & fit
customer_reviews.text: Quicker delivery than expected. Very durable product at a fantastic price (I bought a $20 generic grill cover for my Genesis last year & it barely made it through the winter). This one has an 18 month warranty, so if the elements aren’t kind to it...well then I replace it...with or without the warranty. My Genesis measures 58”, but to be on the safe side I ordered a 60”. Yes the 58” mostly likely would’ve been fine, but sometime one has to take into account for shrinkage...our KS summer sun can be brutal & yes it has shrunk my other grill covers. Overall this appears to be just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: 7Kcks

customer_reviews.title: Durable and heavy duty feeling
customer_reviews.text: Feels durable and heavy duty. The velcro on the sides let you adjust at the base of the grill. Looks like it will last, time will tell. Note, grill on pictures is a 4 burners charbroil performance.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Not UV resistant or very durable
customer_reviews.text: It’s been two years since we bought this grill cover. It fit our grill well, but after the first year it was completely faded. Now on the second year it’s completely falling apart (see pictures). For the price it’s not bad, but when you look at the marketing information that it’s “UV resistant, weatherproof, durable” then I would disagree. It’s a cheap grill cover and you’ll get a year or two out of it. ===update=== Manufacturer provided a free replacement so I increased from 2 to 4 stars. I still don’t particularly agree with marketing about UV resistant, but when consider the price of the product and the free replacement extending its life, it’s acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: William Abner

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: We have the Weber Genesis E-330 and it fits like a glove. I have seen some reviews indicating it was "too long". I like the fact that it basically goes all the way to the deck floor, but doesn't drag or bunch up. I think it's the perfect length. The velcro straps on the sides let you "just cinch it" (I'm sure someone will get that joke) so it fits perfect. It's also quite heavy material. It does not come off as "thin or flimsy". So far, it's standing up to everything from sun to high wind, rain and snow here in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Handlebar

customer_reviews.title: Waster resistant for a little while, see update
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good cover in the beginning. After 2 years of use in low sun lit area it is completely faded, I can literally see thru it. If you want to buy a new cover every year, this will be fine. UPDATE 4/29/2020 I stand by my original review if 2 stars but I updated to 4 stars because if amazing customer service. I did not know there was a 2 yr warranty, after my initial post I was promptly contacted by customer service to verify my address and immediately shipped me a new cover. No questions. 3 days of rain and the new cover is holding up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: It may last exactly 1 year. If you are lucky
customer_reviews.text: Our seldom used grill sits in a sheltered area of one of the patios coming out of the basement. Only gets direct sunlight in the top of the summer. This cover has faded, gotten thin, and torn just from sitting on the grill. I will have to replace it before the next storm. I was hoping for a good, quality product. This had promise, but it did not deliver.
customer_reviews.author: CatCreekJim

customer_reviews.title: Solid-ish
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as far as keep grill from the elements. I do love the Velcro straps at the bottom that secures it tightly to the grill. I live in a wicked windy area and it holds it on. The really big negative though is that I've only owned and used it for 2 months yet it's so sun faded you'd think it's been 2 years. Overall a good item but got ugly quick. ***update 7-20-15*** Upgraded to 4 stars for excellent customer service. They said it should not have faded like that and sent me a replacement one. Great service on their part. I will update after a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Justin Coole

customer_reviews.title: Seams are disintegrating, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product- seams are disintegrating after just two months, leaving black residue everywhere. They advertise it being three layer material uv resistant material, but it is actually a single layer and has degraded and turned gray faster than any barbecue cover I've ever had. seeking a replacement or refund from Amazon. I Don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan the man

customer_reviews.title: Too early for an accurate review
customer_reviews.text: Every time I get a message asking for a review I weigh whether I should submit a review before putting the item through its paces, or just be done with it to get the seller off my back. This one's the latter. I don't know how weatherproof, durable, or water resistant the cover is, because I just got it. So, I'm giving it mediocre ratings. It might really be outstanding and outlast the grill, or it might fall apart in the next rain. Time will tell. It LOOKS like it should hold up against the elements - it doesn't feel or appear cheap, and it fit well enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. Piper

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Grill covers that I ever examined.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three different grill covers to get the best size fit for a grill that measured 48" H x 60" wide" x 27" Deep (front to back). Although I thought that the cover should be rated as superior in materials and workmanship, I did not keep this cover,because it was slightly longer than I wanted. I.E.: It fit the width and depth dimensions but was about 2" too long so that it got caught under the grill wheels . ----Maybe touched the ground because it was for a grill slightly wider than mine. However, based on my appraisal of quality material/construction, the price was terrific.
customer_reviews.author: HTMc

customer_reviews.title: Only good for one use apparently.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a really decent cover when I first opened it, but that is not the case. Put it back on my grill for the second time today, it just barely caught the corner of the grill and ripped wide open with little to no effort. So, to recap, I only got 1 use out of it. Looks like I’ll just go to lowes instead of taking a risk on a different one from Amazon. Cant speak for the water resistance part of it since it wasnt on long enough to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: The grill cover is of excellent quality and has stood up well to our rainy Pacific Northwest weather. The next section is totally my responsibility / fault, not the sellers: I measured my grill 72" from side to side. I unfortunately did not measure the height of my grill. The grill cover drags on the ground and in my case, rests in the dirt. Next time I will be careful to measure not only from side to side, but from top to bottom as well. Customer service for Homitt is EXCELLENT. The make sure that everything is right with your order. There is no risk in trying this product out as they have a really good return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the item
customer_reviews.text: Product purchased and in use for one month now. It fits the grill, a three burner Weber. The cover is indeed water proof, as was claimed by the company and was disputed by several customers. I am happy with the item. It is a less expensive alternative vs the Weber brand alternative. The fabric does not appear woven, but produced in another synthetic process, which makes me doubtful it will last, but we'll see. For now, it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Psychdoc

customer_reviews.title: Homitt replaced torn faded cover - great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Less than two years and it's completely useless!!! I wish I hadn't bought it, but it was cheap so I took a chance. Now it's torn, faded, and useless. This looked good out of the package, but, just an old tarp would have been better. In fact, just a big garbage bag would have lasted longer and done a better job. I wish I could post pics to show how it disintegrated in the weather. DON'T BUY if you want it to last. UPDATE: HOMITT CONTACTED ME AND REPLACED COVER WITH UPDATED DESIGN, QUICKLY, FREE OF CHARGE. BECAUSE OF GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE, I'VE CHANGED MY RATING TO 4 STARS AND I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: Boggledude

customer_reviews.title: Precipitation hasn't discolored or stained the grill cover.
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover hasn't stained or discolored despite heavy wind and rain. It fits the grill perfectly. I like the adjustable straps for a secure, snug fit. My previous purchase of a competitor's tan-colored grill cover was a mistake. Yes, the competitor's grill cover fit and was sturdy and waterproof too. However, because of heavy, constant wind and precipitation, it quickly became a backyard eye-sore with staining and discoloration. This grill cover I anticipate will last longer than the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie

customer_reviews.title: Hommit, backs their products
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second Homitt grill cover. The first one lasted around 6 months without any tears. I have to admitt, I didn't replace it until it became totally torn at about a year. I will say I am dissapointed in my second one because the material seems to be a lot thinner. I don't think it will last as long as the previous. **Update** 06/24/2019 Apparently Homitt read my review and sent me another grill cover without even contacting me. I added another star for that. However long the cover lasts, I'll have another once the first tears/gives out.
customer_reviews.author: Johann

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this grill cover for about 6.5 months and it’s already ripped. We also have to use an extra bungee cord to keep it from the wind blowing off as the side straps don’t work great. It’s an ok grill cover but I wouldn’t call it heavy duty ripping in less than a year. I wouldn’t highly recommend this cover and would not purchase again UPDATE: the company contacted me very quickly and has offered for me to try another cover free of charge. This shows the company actually cares and reads their reviews. Hopefully this next cover hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Zipsie

customer_reviews.title: It looks good but leaks!
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks pretty good, but after the first rain I was surprised to see a lot of water on top of my grill. The cover leaked badly! Update: I contacted the seller regarding the leaking issue. And seller responded quickly, promising to send me an upgraded version of the cover as a replacement. I am impressed by the seller's sincerity. I would rate the seller five star. I changed the product rating from one star to three, and will further update my rating once I receive the replacement and test it out. Further update: The replacement cover went through storms with no leak. So I upgraded the rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size / UPDATED Review
customer_reviews.text: Despite measuring my grill (more than once, to be sure) before ordering, the cover was too small. I was able to stretch it over my grill but the corners are extremely tight and the fabric is stressed and starting to tear. On the positive side, the fabric seems decent under normal usage conditions (although we'll see how it holds up to Iowa weather) and it comes with a storage bag (that we'll probably never use - for the grill cover anyway). UPDATE: The seller promptly contacted me and sent another cover right away. The replacement cover fits much better. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience turned out good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 2018, faded within 6 months, small tears within a year, and completely destroyed within 2 years. Price wasn't bad, although it's more expensive now than it was when I purchased it. I do like the velcro straps that keep it in place during storms. Update: The company reached out to me after seeing my review, and has issued a replacement cover (improved version) to me free of charge, despite being a few months out of the warranty period. Excellent customer service and a company willing to stand behind their product. Overall, I'm happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: KungPao

customer_reviews.title: We’ll made
customer_reviews.text: So far the cover fits nicely. Only time will tell about durability, water resistance, and weatherproofing. It looks like we’ll sewn together. I wonder if they make one for Traeger grills.
customer_reviews.author: phishDr.

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice....but great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: For one thing it really didn't fit the grill, too large, secondly it faded real bad, thirdly the piping is turning to dust. If you buy this, don't put it in the sun, I have not had much luck with any of the grill covers no matter what brand. They never last for 6 months. I guess I will leave my grill uncovered and to the elements from now on. Additional note: Homitt contacted me and they offered a full refund for the cover or a new cover. I decline the new cover and they refunded the full amount. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Was only good for attracting Cats to urinate on.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's wrong to blame them for having an excessive amount of stray cats roaming porches and patios and my area but if I leave my grill outside then what else would I need a cover for? So despite being "Water Proof" the smell it keeps from random cats spraying it is beyond disgusting. So I discarded the cover and just keep the grill in the garage until its time to light it up.
customer_reviews.author: Starscream22

customer_reviews.title: Rating after over 2 years use
customer_reviews.text: Item after two years use in the elements of Marietta, Georgia is ripped, torn and the seams are falling apart. I do not know expectations of how long this item should last but I can report on how long it lasted for me. My star ratings were an average over the life of this item.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover is just good enough for the price. It fits my Weber Genesis II E-310 perfectly. It is waterproof, so at least that part of the description is accurate. It lacks a little in the durability department though. I haven't even had this cover for a full year, and it's already very faded, and the bottom edges are already fraying pretty bad. In the 8 months of having it, I would guess that I take it off/put it on my grill about once a week on average. In the end, this cover is just okay, and will serve its purpose until I get one of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Update (?) on the worst cover I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Update on the replacement. Junk. Waste of time and money. It did the same thing the original did. Update - Homitt contacted me with a replacement cover. 3 stars for excellent customer service. Hopefully the cover will last longer than the last. In 5 months, it faded and the trim edges degraded so bad, they basically turned to ash. They leave stains on your fingers when you touch them like charcoal or wood left after a fire. Hope I can return it for a refund- completely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: High quality cover
customer_reviews.text: This is my second cover, first lasted 4 years. This is not one of those plastic coated covers. It is susceptible to UV rays so you should use a UV coating on it. I was very impressed for for this cover at this price. Fits perfectly on my grill, and if you use the straps on the bottom stays on in high winds. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 3 burner CharBroil perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly in good condition inside a drawstring satchel. Fit my 3 burner CharBroil perfectly. Time will tell how good this product is. Last one I purchased from Homitt lasted 2.5 years. Stays out all year here in Northeast. I think sun does most damage as last one faded and became brittle. I am careful to let grill cool before covering. Last one also did not have the velcro fasteners on the sides but did have handles which are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: L. Guarino

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when new, fades quickly - UPDATE: The seller provided a Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: After a year of sun exposure, this cover went from vibrant black to faded gray. I expected an outdoor grill cover to withstand sun fading as a very minimum. I have Sunbrella cushions that look new after several years of sun exposure. Yes, it looks nice but would not have ordered based on color degradation. UPDATED: Revised to 4 stars based on the seller having provided a new and improved cover which I just received. Hopefully the color fading issue will not occur.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sease

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit properly
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material is like a rubberized Oxford, think Oxford shirts. My husband has a Charbroil Infared 4-burner gas grill. The product description says it fits. In reality it does not. If I had the right grill for this cover, it would likely be a very nice cover. Update: The seller is absolutely phenomenal! They reached out in response to my concern and made things right. Very committed to customer care and quality of their products. I would shop with them again gladly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item Christmas 2017 and first used it in early Spring of 2018. It started fading within 3 months and I just noticed the stitching and the hems are deteriorating and falling off in pieces. The size is larger than the weber genesis grill needs so it is plenty loose, so tight fitting could not cause and material deteriorating. Disappointed with this products quality. I wonder what warranty does this cover have and If Hommit will stand behind its product. Please advise. Chetty
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Chetty

customer_reviews.title: Great price and savings
customer_reviews.text: I have a Weber gas grill and needed a replacement cover. In the past I had paid the $68 for a Weber branded cover and it worked great for many years. I had ordered a similar one for my smoker and was pleased and I figured for 1/2 the price of the Weber one I would just get the same brand as the smoker. Only have had it a few months but it keeps my grill and smoker dry and saved me money. Doesn't show any signs of wear so I think this will do the trick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought "Homitt 7105 Grill Cover, 600D Oxford Fabric 30-inch BBQ Grill Cover with UV and PVC Coating for Water Resistant, Wind Resistant and UV Resistant" cover exactly two years (October 2018) ago and was initially pleased by the product. It looked durable and stayed put. It started to fade about a year ago but still appear to protect from the elements. Not anymore - I noticed it started to leak this summer (2020) and would need to be replaced. Although this is not an expensive cover I'd hope it would last longer. This seems to be a common theme in the reviews and not specific to my cover
customer_reviews.author: Yan P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I'm one to research anything I buy to death. I looked around for a reasonable, sturdy grill cover and found this one. I actually reordered this one, as my old one (same one) finally gave out after 4 years from the elements (lots of sun, high temps and some rain). But I would still highly recommend this cover because it's super affordable and great quality. I use my grill quite a bit, and after taking off and putting on, it's held up (which is why I reordered the exact same one). It's not difficult to get on or off. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look good after a few months.  They sent me a new one.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold up. I like the cover but i expect it to last about 1 to 2 years. That is not too much to ask. if you have to replace the grill cover every 6 months, you might as well by a new grill every 2 years and not mess around with a cover. I'll reach out to the company about sending me a new one or getting a refund. I'll update the comments later. Update...They sent me a new one, thanks. I hope it holds up but i would say the customer service is excellent. The product is nice i just hope this one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: BornIntoTwoWorlds

customer_reviews.title: Great cover! Fits my 64 inch Charbroil 4 burner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill cover in April 2017. Recently I had a minor problem with the cover. After communicating with the seller they immediately took care of the issue. I don't think you could find better customer service. Thank you Homitt.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne in NY

customer_reviews.title: Rip resistant? You be the judge.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in July 2020. Left this on our deck from day 1. It’s not fading as much and in the one time we had a summer storm the cover kept our grill dry. We need more rain days to confirm. As for being tear resistant, the attached pictures tell it all.
customer_reviews.author: Cris L

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but doesn’t hold up as advertised.- UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: *Update 1/22* The vendor send a new cover which they feel is stronger as a replacement. I look forward to testing it's durability and seeing if it is does in fact make a difference. In the interim, for their responsiveness alone, I've updated my review to 4/5 stars* I’ve had this for just over a year and wished I would have checked the warranty earlier. The grill cover definitely has faded dramatically and has torn on the ends covering our grill. I liked it at first and thought we had made a safe bet, but this couldn’t stand up to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L

customer_reviews.title: This cover is terrible and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This cover is terrible and a waste of money. I don't know how it got such good reviews. It faded very badly and became very brittle within three months. I know it is in the sun. But, I would expect to get at least a good year or more out of a grill cover. It became so brittle. I now has two tears in it from just removing the cover carefully without force to use the grill. If I could get a refund, I would.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not what is pictured. Tacky flame graphic on the cover.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what is pictured. Looks very tacky with a yellow and red graphic that says “Grill” and had a flame behind it. Does not say Hommitt anywhere on it. Not sure if they sent the wrong grill cover because it definitely is not the quality that is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Less Than A Month
customer_reviews.text: The unit fit my grill perfectly, and really looked very nice. But, after less than a month, the cover is fading, and the material material used to cover the seams to make them water proof is literally deteriorating and falling apart. There are a lot of good reviews for this product, so it may be that I got one from a bad production run, or that these just aren't meant for as much sun as my grill gets. In either case, I asked for, and was given a refund which i appreciate very much.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Does a job perfectly, and is priced well below what I could’ve spent!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a grill cover quickly, and there are tons of them on Amazon, however I took a chance on this product and was completely surprised and very satisfied. It is good strong material and is completely waterproof it did a beautiful job of protecting my stainless steel grill. I live in New England and left my grill out all winter, the winter had its way with the cover so I ended up buying another one but at this price my grill, my best friend, is well worth it. Buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate at best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover in September of 2017. It has been on our BBQ under a covered patio ever since and the material is failing. I don't mind that the cover faded from the sun, we are in Northern CA and i would be surprised if a black cover held its color. The main issue for me is that all the material on the seems is degrading and the inside of the cover seems to get the grill dirtier than if I just left it off... The design looks slightly different now but I'm not sure I would trust the cover to be any different.
customer_reviews.author: P. Craw4d

customer_reviews.title: Protects Grill but thin fabric
customer_reviews.text: This cover does what it’s supposed to do which is to protect my grill from the elements. I’ve only had it a month. It’s a little large for my grill and because of that the bottom got caught on the wheels and has already torn. I wish the cover was made a little thicker but for the price this works for me. UPDATE: the manufacturer contacted me immediately and sent me out a new cover as a replacement. Good customer service! I’ve changed my review to 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.text: Edited: the seller reached out to me shortly after this review. I've never had a seller stand behind their product like this one has. They stand by their warranty and really wanted to be sure I was happy. Id happily do business with them again. As I said in my first review; the central Texas sun might be a little to brutal and it might not have been the manufacturers fault it failed. I'll be keeping my grill in the shade this up coming summer.. I'd recommend doing the same if you're in the southern states.
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about 6 months :(
customer_reviews.text: Lemon or is this normal? It tears like crazy! It fit fantastic and was fine until the first winter (and I live in mild PNW weather), when the material started cracking abd tearing. I'm on year 2 now and it's so brittle, a little piece breaks everytime I pull it over the grill :(
customer_reviews.author: PCEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Only lassted 6 months.....
customer_reviews.text: Fit is okay but only lasted about 6 months. Now it is faded, frayed and looks like it has been dragged behind a car for a couple of miles. Granted it is San Diego and exposed to sun all the time but past covers have lasted at least 2, usually 3 years. UPDATE: Homitt contacted me after writing review and replaced the grill cover. The fabric the new cover is made of is more durable and looks like it will last longer. Time will tell, but this company really cares about producing a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Samay

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, just fades
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our grill last year to replace the cover that came with our grill originally. The material is nice and thick and the quality is good. We have not had any issues with it tearing. We live in Northern Virginia and it rains a lot here, but we have not had any moisture issues either. The only reason I removed a star was because of the fading of the material. However, our last cover was also black and faded significantly. I think that if you want less fade, it is a better idea to go with a lighter color.
customer_reviews.author: Wife-Mom-Teacher...tired

customer_reviews.title: Too long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a weber 310 grill. Width is spot on but the length is WAY TOO LONG. It should rest about 1/2 to 1 inch above the ground but its seems to be about 6 - 8 inches too long. Hence you cannot move the grill without getting it caught on the wheel and when it rains, the water piddles up at the excess fabric that lays on the ground. I would assume if your grill is taller, it should be fine. But if its a WEBER....AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K..

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Better off burning your $20 bill if you want to buy this one
customer_reviews.text: In about a year, the seams completely disintegrated causing water to go right through. Destroyed my grill. It would've been better not using a cover in this case as my grill would've atleast had the chance to air/ dry out. But nope, it allowed water in and trapped it in to make sure everything rusted. Even some stainless parts developed rust. What a cheat of a product. Edit: The company reached out to me and set things right. I really appreciate what they did. They also noted that their product has improved / changed since then. Thanks. I wish other companies that made not so good products would do the same.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October 2018. The cover fit fine and protected my grill (Weber 3 burner) while it lasted. The color faded very quickly, so this was a light gray by 2019. In March 2020, I went to remove the cover from the grill and it tore due to rot. The tear was not at a seam, but in the middle of the fabric. The cover cannot sit in the elements, although that's what I bought it for. I'm glad it wasn't expensive, but a cheap tarp would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: uk_jon_nh

customer_reviews.title: update Company stands by warranty/feeling out replacement currently  - The cover split apart within a few weeks and now ...
customer_reviews.text: update: Got the replacement and have only taken it off once so far/haven't had it exposed to the elements long. Will update again after a few weeks in the elements. So far no issues with the replacement. Company has amazing customer service! Got the replacement the next day and they were in contact with me the whole time. Hoping this cover stands up to elements better and we have it for long use. So far so good. original review: The cover split apart within a few weeks and now leaves a portion of the grill exposed. Also seems to tear from the slightest edge of the grill scratching it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: After a year of wear and tear, still works great
customer_reviews.text: The cover is on a grill that is outside year round, and has seen temperatures from 20 degrees F all the way up to 115 F (yes one hundred and fifteen). The attached velcro has kept the cover secure thru winds of up to 50 mph guests, mnaybe even a little higher, while the grill was in the backyard and exposed to direct winds. The cover is holding up well so far, and doing what we wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mnstargazer

customer_reviews.title: Faded and disintegrated after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: By the end of the second summer, this product was severely compromised by the weather, I think mostly UV because it faded in color and became thin and brittle. It sits on my patio exposed to sun for something like 8 hours a day in the summer, and is exposed to the wind when there are gusts, but this is NJ not a New Hampshire mountainside. It is really not good enough, and did not last for an acceptable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Best One To Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Its great. Heavy weight without being too heavy. Nicely made velcro straps on each side to keep it snug, and looking nice on your patio. Longer then most so it does to or almost to the deck and covers the entire grill. My old one stopped a couple inches before the ground and my stainless grill got mildred and rust there. Great price as it will last a very long time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cat R.

customer_reviews.title: Cover fades drastically
customer_reviews.text: I want to take time to write this review since we have had this for over a year. Please keep in mind this cover, along with grill, were stored during the cold winter months. So this has actually been outside for about five months. This exceeded our expectation as far as protecting the grill at first. At the end of last season we noticed it was trying to get a tear in the corner. It’s completely ripped through now. However, it’s alarming how it faded after a few months. We got it out today for the season and I was just shocked. It’s an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price but doesn't hold up well to the sun and wind. I've had mine in use for less than a year and I can see already it will need to be replaced within the next few months. I've never found one of these that lasts as long as I think it should, that being said this seems to be OK considering the price. Update: 8/23/19 They sent a replacement for free that seems to be of better quality. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Christen

customer_reviews.title: Edit-Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised, in a good way, to receive a brand new cover in the mail. Didn't even request one, adding a star for great service will revisit in a couple of months to see how this new one holds up. It seems well made, however when I take it off after it rains the grill is all wet. Too bad as it fits my grill well but going into the cold season I don't want it to be frozen on there when I want to use my grill. Only had it since May, not a good value if I have to get another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Redbird567

customer_reviews.title: Quality, price and service.  What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: The grill cover seems well made with a nice thick material. It comes with a handle on each side conveniently place to make lifting this off the grill easy. I did get to try out the customer service, through no fault of the product (but I'm not going to explain more for risk of self incrimination). The company was super responsive and sent me a new cover with no hesitation. Great product. Great service. Of course, I originally bought it cause i was too cheap to buy the one at the big conglomerate hardware store. So, great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove - Weber E-315
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great and you can't beat the price. It's less than half the price of the Weber cover available for this grill. It handled the rain like a champ this past weekend. I've only had it a few days so I can't speak to how long it will last. It seems to be made of good quality so I'm recommending it. I'll definitely update this review if it doesn't stand up to the weather here in Western Washington.
customer_reviews.author: BLUE ELEPHANT

customer_reviews.title: Missing Velcro Strap
customer_reviews.text: The grill cover seems to be great. The only thing that is wrong is mine came missing one of the Velcro straps that hold the cover together near the bottom. I'm afraid that without it I may either lose the cover or it will not lift the cover high enough off the floor and cause moisture buildup within the grill. I will be happy to raise my rating if this is rectified.
customer_reviews.author: candy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars-Updated
customer_reviews.text: Protects the grill, severely faded already and have had it about a month. Update: Since reviewing this product the company has reached out. They have a customer satisfaction guarantee which is always a great thing! Their customer service has been great and very easy to communicate with. I have updated my rating because although the product may have been defective, good customer service always out ways the bad. I would definitely purchase from them again. If I have any more updates on a new cover I will do another review!
customer_reviews.author: Avan01

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Price Okay, Material Turns Purple
customer_reviews.text: The price certainly is good and the quality is fine, but take a look at the photo and see the fading that's occurred in just 2 weeks in the sun. I had a lawn mower cover made of the same material and it turned purple in a few weeks as well, and over time, more and more purple. I think the material will stand up to the elements at least long enough to justify it's expense but if the severe discoloration matters to you, you might want to look for another material. The discoloration in the photo is not the lighting, it's the difference between the top and side of the cover being exposed to direct sun.
customer_reviews.author: Karl P.

customer_reviews.title: I like that it stays put but the quality is not ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and the velcro straps definitely hold it on. Although there was one very windy day that it was just about to blow off when we noticed it and pulled it back on. That being said, within a month, the fabric was very faded. Also I have a stiff wire brush that stores on the side of the grill and it shredded through the fabric. I'm not even sure how it happened, because it was just being stored. I like that it stays put but the quality is not what the description led me to believe,
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Freyh

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Okay after this review, they reached out and replaced my cover with a new and improved version. Much appreciation for them to resolve this quickly. New one does seem to be better quality. We shall see Thick material? No I don't think so. Its pretty thin and literally flaking apart at the seams. UV protection? Well it's fading from black to grey color and looks like it's about to crumble away. Not made for Texas weather. Very disappointed with this as I hoped to get ar least a season worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Big for Spirit Series
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this for the Weber Spirit series grills even though it says fits Weber. I have the new E310, and this cover is ridiculously big on the grill. It's baggy and hits the ground with extra material folded up. It just looks silly in addition to not protecting the grill correctly. A cover should fit closely to block out the elements from underneath. Unfortunately, my grill came the day after the return window closed for the cover.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Way too big for Char Broil 3 burner grill !!
customer_reviews.text: I read through lots of reviews for this product, I haven't seen my issue addressed. The description says fits most 3 and 4 burner grills.....I guess that all depends on what you mean by the word "fits". I have a Char Broil 3 burner grill, so I assumed I was buying the correct size. It looks absurdly ridiculous on my grill, just swallows it up and drags on the ground, and also I don't have any idea how those Velcro straps are supposed to work to secure the bottom. I plan to send it back but I'll have to eat the shipping charges, I can't keep it because it just looks so stupid on my grill.
customer_reviews.author: KT Palm Springs

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of the grill cover. While researching grill covers I was wanted it well made, water proof, and with fastening of the cover to be higher on the grill. I found all three of these qualities with this Homitt grill cover, thank you. Being reasonably priced was an added bonus, which is why I ordered it right away, instead of thinking about making this purchase. So glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The cover is not as heavy a material as found in products that are 3x the cost made by companies such as Weber. However, it lasts nearly as long - they all take damage (in my case) from extensive sun exposure, and in winter times of extreme cold. I also use the grill almost daily, year round, and take it on and off which is a bit of wear and tear. In the long run, I get grill protection for less cost.
customer_reviews.author: dscotrobin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t determine the water resistance or durability of the Homitt because I just received it. What I can comment on is the workmanship and material. The material is lighter than the well-made but non-durable Garden Home I returned. In that one the material split after about four months. This new one by Homitt is poorly made, of lighter material and doesn’t fit well. The seams are not well finished and it is generally oversized and hangs on the deck. I am going to return it. BTW, the original price was more than the Garden Home.
customer_reviews.author: Coolwater

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover lasted about 2 1/2 years and I just bought another. I live in the Big Bear area of California...lots of snow during winter and lots of sun the rest of the time. It's the sun that destroys these covers. They fade after a year but continue staying weatherproof for at least 2 years. Considering I only get a year and a little more out of heavy duty polyethylene tarps...well. It's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money going back to original manufacturer for next cover.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time and money. Less than 5 months and already has several tears. Pulled off and put on less than 12 times. Prior cover from the grill manufacturer lasted years. Will be throwing this thing in the trash and ordering one from the manufacturer. One plus was it didn’t fade over these few months.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a month
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this, as it is already falling apart at one of the top seams. I have had this for just under a month. Thankfully I noticed the tear today, since I almost missed the return date. I will spend more money and just get an original Weber cover. The first one lasted more that 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier
customer_reviews.text: This is the third cover bought in three years. The first two were a very thin plastic, sort of a trash bag feel, but a little heavier. This product is substantially heavier. It’s waterproof, attractive, Has Velcro ties at the bottom so the wind doesn’t blow it off. It’s hardly more expensive than the other two i had, but I feel I have more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cav

customer_reviews.title: BIG but functional
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, seems to be a nice, heavy duty, impervious grill cover. We have an older model Weber Genesis Silver B. Some reviews said it would fit this model.Well, it does, although quite bigly I must say. I tie the velcro straps to a chair to assure it doesn't blow away. All in all, it IS quite functional as far as keeping the elements out, just kind of big. Good deal for the price, snugger fitting Weber made covers are about 3 times as much. Homitt went out of their way to send me a better fitting cover at no cost. Excellent customer service 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: hargo

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels sturdy. Fits my Webber 210 series. The real test will be how it looks in a year or more. Update: Adjusting my rating downward. It's been exactly 2 years and my cover is officially useless. The cover has turned gray and the seams have come completely apart at the top and no longer protect my Weber grill. I understand that actually engineering a product to last more than two years isn't always in the best interest of the "bottom-line", but somebody has to willing to make a decent quality product that can go more than than two summers. I am now looking for my 3rd cover in three years. Anyone have any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: David C. Bowie

product_meta.title: Homitt Gas Grill Cover, 60-inch 3-4 Burner 600D Heavy Duty Waterproof BBQ Cover with Handles and Adjustable Straps for Most Brands of Grill -Black
product_meta.description:
Size:60inchHomitt 7017 waterproof grill cover for fade resistant, ultraviolet resistant resistant, weather resistant, water resistant and rip resistant; it makes your grill life more convenient and easier! 

High Quality
The BBQ grill cover is made of high end 600D Oxford fabric and PVC cover, which enable itself to protect your gas grill from hail, wind, heat, cold, bugs, insects, rain, or snow, thus offering a complete cover to your grill. Strong velcro straps to keep it secure on the grill.

Fit More Brands
The barbecue grill cover fits many brands. The size is 60” long * 24” deep * 44” high. Do not hesitate that you buy a wrong cover for your grill. Our grill cover can fit most grill.

Advantages
1. If living in a windy area, our bbq grill cover has velcro fasteners on two sides to keep the cover in place. Having the fasteners that are easy to strap together, your grill can sit outside all seasons.
2. The grill cover has PVC cover to prevent your grill from water in raining day, so you don't have to worry about taking the cover off and your grill being wet or having water spots after a storm. In addition to stopping water from reaching the grill it also prevents dust, leaves etc from accumulating on any surface as well as stopping sun damage from fading.

Easy to Install
Only one person can do it, please put on the cover, and then tie velcro straps to keep it secure on the grill. You can easy to put the grill cover on or off by yourself. 

Package includes
1*BBQ grill cover
1*storage bag
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: This Homitt bbq cover measures 60"L x 28"W x 44"H, fits most grills with 3 to 4 burners, width between 55 and 58inch. Fits for Weber BBQ grill, along with many other popular brands grill, such as charbroil, Broil King, brinkmann, jenn air, nexgrill, Royal Gourmet, Kenmore, etc.

UPGRADED PREMIUM MATERIAL: Our gas grill covers are made of heavy duty waterproof 600D oxford fabric and PVC layer, prevent your grill from water, snow, sun, dust, and so on, keep your barbeque grill clean like new.
FADING RESISTANT: Sun resistant design prevents sun damage. Sun resistant layer protects the grill cover from fading, extends service life. NOTE: Allow the grill to cool before covering.

HANDLES AND STRAPS: Handles at two sides of the cover make it easier to fit and remove. It can also be used for hanging and storage. With two widened adjustable nylon sticker, you can tighten the cover securely over the grills, so the wind does not blow it away.
DURABLE SEWN: With double sewn for edge and connection, the cover is more durable and rip resistant. (Please check your grill's dimension for proper fit before purchasing).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars8,000 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
